data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the Spilomelinae (Lepidoptera, Pyralidae s. l.) of the Galápagos Islands, Ecuador

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bernard Landry (2016): Taxonomic revision of the Spilomelinae (Lepidoptera, Pyralidae s. l.) of the Galápagos Islands, Ecuador. Revue suisse de Zoologie 123 (2): 315-399, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.155309
